deformablemesh.geometry

Class Furrow3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • deformablemesh.geometry.Furrow3D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Interceptable

    public class Furrow3D
extends Object
implements Interceptable
    Represents a 2d infinite plane with a center of mass, and a normal. The coordinates are in normalized space. User: msmith Date: 8/5/13 Time: 11:42 AM To change this template use File | Settings | File Templates.

      Furrow3D(double[] center, double[] direction)

      • getDistance

        public double getDistance(Node3D a)
        Gets the signed distance to the point, if the value is greater than 0 then the point is infront of the plane, if it is negative then the point is behind the plane.
        Parameters:
        a - node to check
        Returns:
        the normal distance to the plane
